channel.title: Quest Tab?
channel.description:
I want to make achievement diary, to make it when you click for example food: it would give an items such as noted shark. Can someone give me the code and what files they go into..
Server base: pi 317
Also, achievement diary is already added i just need the codes to add items...

item.title: Quest Tab?
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

go to clickingbuttons.java
Search for “case 108006:”
Under this case u will need to add a new case like this.

/*case 114112:// if (c.inWild() && c.isBanking) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do this right now"); } else if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 1) { c.sendMessage("You need atleast 1 free slot to use this feature."); c.getItems().addItem(ID, AMOUNT); } else { c.sendMessage("MESSAGE"); } break;
